question: [File: aptos-core/consensus/safety-rules/src/serializer.rs] [Function: handle_message()] [Output Serialization Type Safety] Each match arm serializes different return types (ConsensusState, (), Signature, Vote, OrderVote) - can type confusion in serialization cause responses to be misinterpreted by clients?
